refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the value of the specified configuration option for the tidy document

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: tidy_getopt returns the value of the specified option for the specified tidy object. The return type depends on the type of the specified option. You will find a list with each configuration option and their types at: &url.tidy.conf;.

para.example:
tidy_getopt example Title

'; $config = array('accessibility-check' => 3, 'alt-text' => 'some text'); $tidy = new tidy(); $tidy->parseString($html, $config); var_dump($tidy->getOpt('accessibility-check')); //integer var_dump($tidy->getOpt('lower-literals')); //boolean var_dump($tidy->getOpt('alt-text')); //string ?> &example.outputs; int(3) bool(true) string(9) "some text"
